name: Crazy Plane (FelinoLOL)
description:
Do you want to enjoy flying airplane above clouds? Then Crazy Plane is for you!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What is Crazy Plane?  - Crazy Plane is Airplane simulator.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W - Up

A - Left

S - Down

D - Right

Mouse - rotate

Esc - pause game

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version History:

Prototype version 0.1:

- Added clouds

- Game can be now paused by pressing Esc

- Airplane is now controllable

Prototype version 0.2:     (CURRENT)

-  Fixed bug with clouds

- Plane now have better texture

- Bug fix about plane

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks for playing Crazy Plane!

Game made by FelinoLOL. No copying allowed.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
